```{python}
# Read in libraries
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from lets_plot import *
LetsPlot.setup_html(isolated_frame=True)
# read in df
url = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/byuidatascience/data4names/master/data-raw/names_year/names_year.csv'
df = pd.read_csv(url)
print(df.head())
```

```{python}
df_oliver_utah = df.query("name == 'Oliver'")


total_olivers_utah = df_oliver_utah['UT'].sum()
print(f"Total Olivers born in Utah (all years): {total_olivers_utah}")
```

```{python}
df_felisha = df.query("name == 'Felisha'")

# Find rows where at least one state column has a nonzero count
state_cols = df.columns[2:]  # skip 'name' and 'year'
df_felisha_nonzero = df_felisha[(df_felisha[state_cols] > 0).any(axis=1)]

# Get the earliest year
earliest_year = df_felisha_nonzero['year'].min()

print(f"The earliest year the name Felisha was used: {int(earliest_year)}")
```
